mapper.select:
SET TRANSACTION ISOLATION LEVEL READ UNCOMMITTED /* com.m2m.fo.bo.mapper.BoBdPblnMapper.boBdPblnDtl */ SELECT BBD.BID_PBLANC_ID /*입찰공고아이디*/ , BBD.BID_STTUS_CODE /*입찰상태코드*/ , (SELECT CODE_DCTWO FROM CO_CMMN_CD WHERE MAIN_CODE = 'BID_STTUS_CODE' AND SUB_CODE = BBD.BID_STTUS_CODE) AS BID_STTUS /*입찰상태*/ , BBD.METAL_CODE /*금속코드*/ , (SELECT CODE_DCTWO FROM CO_CMMN_CD WHERE MAIN_CODE = 'METAL_CODE' AND SUB_CODE = BBD.METAL_CODE) AS METAL_CODE_NM /*메탈구분*/ , (SELECT CODE_DCONE FROM CO_CMMN_CD WHERE MAIN_CODE = 'METAL_CODE' AND SUB_CODE = BBD.METAL_CODE) AS METAL_CODE_EM /*메탈구분(영어)*/ , BBD.BRAND_GROUP_CODE /*브랜드그룹코드*/ , ISNULL((SELECT CODE_DCTWO FROM CO_CMMN_CD WHERE MAIN_CODE = 'BRAND_GROUP_CODE' AND SUB_CODE = BBD.BRAND_GROUP_CODE),'ANY BRAND') AS BRAND_GROUP_CODE_NM /*브랜드*/ , BBD.BRAND_CODE /*브랜드코드*/ , BBD.ITM_SN /*아이템순번*/ , (SELECT GOODS_NM FROM IT_ITM_INFO_BAS WHERE 1=1 AND BBD.ITM_SN = ITM_SN AND DELETE_AT = 'N') AS DSPY_GOODS_NM /*아이템상품명*/ , BBD.DSTRCT_LCLSF_CODE /*권역대분류코드*/ , (SELECT CODE_DCTWO FROM CO_CMMN_CD WHERE MAIN_CODE = 'DSTRCT_LCLSF_CODE' AND SUB_CODE = BBD.DSTRCT_LCLSF_CODE) AS DSTRCT_NM /*권역*/ , BBD.BID_WT /*입찰중량*/ , BBD.PERM_WT_RATE /*허용중량비율*/ , BBD.DELY_CND_01_PREMIUM_PC , BBD.DELY_CND_02_PREMIUM_PC , BBD.DELY_CND_03_PREMIUM_PC , BBD.DELY_BEGIN_DE /*인도기간시작*/ , BBD.DELY_END_DE /*인도기간종료*/ , BBD.PC_APPN_BEGIN_DE /*가격지정기간시작*/ , BBD.PC_APPN_END_DE /*가격지정기간종료*/ , BBD.PC_APPN_MTH_CODE /*가격지정방법코드*/ , (SELECT CODE_DCTWO FROM CO_CMMN_CD WHERE MAIN_CODE = 'PC_APPN_MTH_CODE' AND SUB_CODE = BBD.PC_APPN_MTH_CODE) AS PC_APPN_MTH_CODE_NM /*가격지정방법*/ ,CONCAT( COALESCE((SELECT CODE_DCTWO FROM CO_CMMN_CD WHERE MAIN_CODE = 'SETLE_CRNCY_CODE' AND SUB_CODE = BBD.SETLE_CRNCY_CODE), 'N/A'),' ', COALESCE((SELECT CODE_DCTWO FROM CO_CMMN_CD WHERE MAIN_CODE = 'SETLE_MTH_CODE' AND SUB_CODE = BBD.SETLE_MTH_CODE), 'N/A'),' ', COALESCE((SELECT CODE_DCTWO FROM CO_CMMN_CD WHERE MAIN_CODE = 'SETLE_PD_CODE' AND SUB_CODE = BBD.SETLE_PD_CODE), 'N/A'),' ' ) AS SETLE_CNDTN /*결제조건*/ , BBD.ETC_CN /*기타코멘트*/ , BBD.BDDPR_BEGIN_DT /*투찰시작일시*/ , BBD.BDDPR_END_DT /*투찰종료일시*/ , BBD.BDDPR_CANCL_LMTT_DE /*투찰취소제한일자*/ , BBD.DSPY_AT /*전시여부*/ , BBD.REJECT_BID_RESN /*유찰사유*/ , BBD.REJECT_BID_RESN_DT /*유찰일시*/
FROM BD_BID_BAS AS BBD
WHERE 1=1 AND BBD.BID_PBLANC_ID = #{bidPblancId} /*입찰공고아이디*/

SET TRANSACTION ISOLATION LEVEL READ UNCOMMITTED /* com.m2m.fo.bo.mapper.BoBdPblnMapper.getBobdUpdateHistroy */ SELECT BID_UPDT_HST_SN /*입찰수정이력순번*/ , BID_PBLANC_ID /*입찰공고아이디*/ , BID_UPDT_CN /*입찰수정내용*/ , BID_UPDT_RESN /*입찰수정사유*/ , FRST_REGISTER_ID /*최초등록자아이디*/ , FRST_REGIST_DT /*최초등록일시*/ , LAST_CHANGER_ID /*최종변경자아이디*/ , LAST_CHANGE_DT /*최종변경일시*/ FROM BD_BID_UPDT_HST WHERE 1=1 AND BID_PBLANC_ID = #{bidPblancId} /*입찰공고아이디*/ ORDER BY FRST_REGIST_DT ASC

SET TRANSACTION ISOLATION LEVEL READ UNCOMMITTED /* com.m2m.fo.bo.mapper.BoBdPblnMapper.getBdEntrpsList 투찰기업리스트*/ SELECT BBD.BID_ENTRPS_NO /*입찰업체번호*/ ,BEIB.ENTRPS_NM /*투찰업체명*/ ,BBD.BID_PBLANC_ID /*입찰공고아이디*/ ,BBD.DELY_CND_CODE /*인도조건코드*/ ,CCC.CODE_DCTWO AS DELY_CND_CNT /*인도조건내용*/ ,BBD.DELY_CND_STDR_PC /*인도조건기준가격*/ ,BBD.CNVRS_PREMIUM_AMOUNT /*전환프리미엄금액*/ ,BBD.BDDPR_PREMIUM_PC /*투찰프리미엄가격*/ ,BBD.BDDPR_WT /*투찰중량*/ ,BBD.PARTCPTN_AGRE_AT /*참여동의여부*/ ,BBD.BDDPR_DT /*투찰일시*/ ,BBD.BDDPR_NRMLT_AT /*투찰정상여부*/ ,BBD.OPENG_RANK /*개찰순위*/ ,BBD.OPENG_DT /*개찰일시*/ ,BBD.SCSBID_AT /*낙찰여부*/ ,BBD.SCSBID_DT /*낙찰일시*/ ,BBD.CANCL_AT /*취소여부*/ ,BBD.CANCL_DT /*취소일시*/ ,BBD.CANCL_RESN /*취소사유*/ ,BBD.DELETE_AT /*삭제여부*/ ,BBD.DELETE_DT /*삭제일시*/ ,BBD.FRST_REGISTER_ID /*최초등록자아이디*/ ,BBD.FRST_REGIST_DT /*최초등록 일시*/ ,BBD.LAST_CHANGER_ID /*최종변경자아이디*/ ,BBD.LAST_CHANGE_DT /*최종변경일시*/ ,DENSE_RANK() OVER (ORDER BY BBD.BDDPR_PREMIUM_PC) AS ENTRPSRANK /*투찰기업순위*/ FROM BD_BDDPR_DTL AS BBD /*입찰투찰상세*/ INNER JOIN BD_ENTRPS_INFO_BAS AS BEIB /*회원업체정보기본*/ ON BBD.BID_ENTRPS_NO = BEIB.BID_ENTRPS_NO INNER JOIN CO_CMMN_CD AS CCC /*공통코드*/ ON CCC.MAIN_CODE = 'BID_DELY_CND' AND CCC.CODE_DCONE = BBD.DELY_CND_CODE WHERE 1=1 AND BID_PBLANC_ID = #{bidPblancId} /*입찰공고아이디*/ AND BBD.DELETE_AT = 'N' /*삭제여부*/ AND BBD.CANCL_AT = 'N' /*취소여부*/
SET TRANSACTION ISOLATION LEVEL READ UNCOMMITTED /* com.m2m.fo.bo.mapper.BoBdPblnMapper.getBoCommCdList */ SELECT MAIN_CODE ,SUB_CODE ,CODE_NM ,CODE_DCONE ,CODE_DCTWO FROM CO_CMMN_CD

SET TRANSACTION ISOLATION LEVEL READ UNCOMMITTED /* com.m2m.fo.bo.mapper.BoBdPblnMapper.getBoBdBrandGrpList 브랜드 */ SELECT IBIB.BRAND_CODE ,IBIB.BRAND_NM ,IBIB.METAL_CODE ,IBIB.NATION_CODE ,IBIB.BRAND_GROUP_CODE FROM IT_BRAND_INFO_BAS AS IBIB INNER JOIN CO_CMMN_CD AS CCC ON IBIB.BRAND_GROUP_CODE =CCC.SUB_CODE WHERE 1=1 AND CCC.MAIN_CODE = 'BRAND_GROUP_CODE'
SET TRANSACTION ISOLATION LEVEL READ UNCOMMITTED /* com.m2m.fo.bo.mapper.BoBdPblnMapper.getBoBdItemList 아이템상품명 */ SELECT ITM_SN ,METAL_CODE ,GOODS_NM FROM IT_ITM_INFO_BAS

SET TRANSACTION ISOLATION LEVEL READ UNCOMMITTED /* com.m2m.fo.bo.mapper.BoBdPblnMapper.getBoBdPblnList */ SELECT BID_PBLANC_ID --입찰공고아이디 ,( SELECT CODE_DCTWO FROM CO_CMMN_CD WHERE MAIN_CODE = 'METAL_CODE' AND SUB_CODE = CAST(BB.METAL_CODE AS INT) ) AS METAL_NAME -- 금속 이름 ,( SELECT GOODS_NM FROM IT_ITM_INFO_BAS WHERE ITM_SN = CAST(BB.ITM_SN AS INT) AND DELETE_AT = 'N' ) AS ITM_NM --아이템명 ,BRAND_CODE --브랜드 코드 ,( SELECT CODE_DCTWO FROM CO_CMMN_CD WHERE MAIN_CODE = 'BRAND_GROUP_CODE' AND SUB_CODE = BB.BRAND_GROUP_CODE AND USE_AT = 'Y' ) AS BRAND_GROUP_CODE_NM -- 브랜드 그룹명 ,( SELECT CODE_DCTWO FROM CO_CMMN_CD WHERE MAIN_CODE = 'DSTRCT_LCLSF_CODE' AND SUB_CODE = BB.DSTRCT_LCLSF_CODE ) AS DSTRCT_LCLSF_CODE -- 권역 대분류 코드 ,BID_WT --수량 ,PERM_WT_RATE --중량 ,BDDPR_BEGIN_DT --투찰 시작 일시 ,BDDPR_END_DT --투찰 종료 일시 ,DSPY_AT --전시 여부 ,BB.FRST_REGIST_DT --등록일 ,BB.FRST_REGISTER_ID --등록자 ,( SELECT CODE_DCTWO FROM CO_CMMN_CD WHERE MAIN_CODE = 'BID_STTUS_CODE' AND SUB_CODE = BB.BID_STTUS_CODE AND USE_AT = 'Y' ) AS BID_STTUS -- 입찰 상태 ,PARTCPTN_ENTRPS_QY --참여 업체 수량 ,( SELECT ISNULL(MIN(BDDPR_PREMIUM_PC), 0) FROM BD_BDDPR_DTL BBD WHERE BBD.BID_PBLANC_ID = BB.BID_PBLANC_ID AND CANCL_AT = 'N' AND DELETE_AT = 'N' ) AS MIN_PREMIUM_PC --최저프리미엄가 FROM BD_BID_BAS BB where DELETE_AT = 'N'
AND BID_STTUS_CODE in ('30','31','32')
AND BID_STTUS_CODE = #{bidSttusCode}
AND BID_PBLANC_ID LIKE '%' + #{bidPblancId} + '%'
AND ( (BDDPR_BEGIN_DT >= #{bddprBeginDt} AND BDDPR_BEGIN_DT <= #{bddprEndDt}) OR (BDDPR_END_DT >= #{bddprBeginDt} AND BDDPR_END_DT <= #{bddprEndDt}) OR (BDDPR_BEGIN_DT <= #{bddprBeginDt} AND BDDPR_END_DT >= #{bddprEndDt}) )
ORDER BY FRST_REGIST_DT DESC
SELECT MAIN_CODE ,SUB_CODE ,CODE_NM ,CODE_DCTWO FROM CO_CMMN_CD WHERE MAIN_CODE = 'BID_STTUS_CODE' AND USE_AT = 'Y' AND DELETE_AT = 'N' ORDER BY CODE_ORDR ASC

SELECT count(*) FROM BD_BID_BAS WHERE
BID_STTUS_CODE in ('30','31','32')
BID_STTUS_CODE = #{_parameter}
AND DELETE_AT = 'N'
mapper.update:
/* com.m2m.fo.bd.mapper.BoBdPblnMapper.updateBoBdPblnDtl 공고수정저장*/ SET TRANSACTION ISOLATION LEVEL READ UNCOMMITTED UPDATE BD_BID_BAS SET BID_STTUS_CODE = #{bidSttusCode} /*입찰상태코드*/ ,METAL_CODE = #{metalCode} /*메탈코드*/ ,BRAND_CODE = #{brandCode} /*브랜드코드*/ ,BRAND_GROUP_CODE = #{brandGroupCode} /*브랜드그룹코드*/ ,ITM_SN = #{itmSn} /*아이템순번*/ ,DSTRCT_LCLSF_CODE = #{dstrctLclsfCode} /*권역대분류코드*/ ,BID_WT = #{bidWt} /*수량*/ ,PERM_WT_RATE = #{permWtRate} /*중량허용공차*/ ,DELY_CND_01_PREMIUM_PC = #{delyCnd01premiumPc} /*인도조건 01프리미엄가격 */ ,DELY_CND_02_PREMIUM_PC = #{delyCnd02premiumPc} /*인도조건 02프리미엄가격 */ ,DELY_CND_03_PREMIUM_PC = #{delyCnd03premiumPc} /*인도조건 03프리미엄가격 */ ,DELY_BEGIN_DE = #{delyBeginDe} /*인도시작일자*/ ,DELY_End_DE = #{delyEndDe} /*인도종료일자*/ ,PC_APPN_BEGIN_DE = #{pcAppnBeginDe} /*가격지정기간시작*/ ,PC_APPN_END_DE = #{pcAppnEndDe} /*가격지정기간종료*/ ,PC_APPN_MTH_CODE = #{pcAppnMthCode} /*가격지정방법*/ ,SETLE_CRNCY_CODE = #{setleCrncyCode} /*결제통화코드*/ ,SETLE_MTH_CODE = #{setleMthCode} /*결제방법코드*/ ,SETLE_PD_CODE = #{setlePdCode} /*결제기간코드*/ ,BDDPR_BEGIN_DT = #{bddprBeginDt} /*투찰시작일시*/ ,BDDPR_END_DT = #{bddprEndDt} /*투찰종료일시*/ ,BDDPR_CANCL_LMTT_DE = #{bddprCanclLmttDe} /*투찰취소제한일자*/ ,LAST_CHANGER_ID = #{lastChangerId} /*최종변경자아이디*/ ,LAST_CHANGE_DT = GETDATE() /*최종변경일시*/ ,DSPY_AT = #{dspyAt} /*전시여부*/
WHERE BID_PBLANC_ID = #{bidPblancId}

/* com.m2m.fo.bd.mapper.BoBdPblnMapper.cancelBoBdPbln 공고취소처리 */ SET TRANSACTION ISOLATION LEVEL READ UNCOMMITTED UPDATE BD_BID_BAS SET BID_STTUS_CODE = '33' /*입찰상태코드*/ ,DSPY_AT = 'N' /*전시여부*/
WHERE BID_PBLANC_ID = #{bidPblancId}

/* com.m2m.fo.bd.mapper.BoBdPblnMapper.failBoBdPbln 공고유찰처리 */ SET TRANSACTION ISOLATION LEVEL READ UNCOMMITTED UPDATE BD_BID_BAS SET BID_STTUS_CODE = '32' /*입찰상태코드*/ ,REJECT_BID_RESN = #{rejectBidResn} /*유찰사유*/ ,REJECT_BID_RESN_DT = CONVERT(NVARCHAR(14), GETDATE(), 112) + REPLACE(CONVERT(NVARCHAR(8), GETDATE(), 108), ':', '') /*유찰일시*/
WHERE BID_PBLANC_ID = #{bidPblancId}

/* com.m2m.fo.bd.mapper.BoBdPblnMapper.deleteBoBdPbln 공고삭제처리 */ SET TRANSACTION ISOLATION LEVEL READ UNCOMMITTED UPDATE BD_BID_BAS SET BID_STTUS_CODE = '33' /*입찰상태코드*/ ,DSPY_AT = 'N' /*전시여부*/ ,DELETE_AT = 'Y' /*삭제여부*/ ,DELETE_DT = GETDATE() /*삭제일시*/
WHERE BID_PBLANC_ID = #{bidPblancId}
mapper.insert: SET TRANSACTION ISOLATION LEVEL READ UNCOMMITTED /* com.m2m.fo.bo.mapper.BoBdPblnMapper.insertBobdUptHist */ INSERT INTO BD_BID_UPDT_HST ( BID_UPDT_HST_SN ,BID_PBLANC_ID ,BID_UPDT_CN ,BID_UPDT_RESN ,FRST_REGISTER_ID ,FRST_REGIST_DT ,LAST_CHANGER_ID ,LAST_CHANGE_DT ) VALUES ( ISNULL((SELECT MAX(BID_UPDT_HST_SN)+1 AS CNT FROM BD_BID_UPDT_HST WHERE BID_PBLANC_ID = #{bidPblancId}), 1) ,#{bidPblancId} ,#{bidUpdtCn} ,#{bidUpdtResn} ,'admin' ,GETDATE() ,'admin' ,GETDATE() )

/* com.m2m.fo.bd.mapper.BoBdPblnMapper.istboBdPbln */
SELECT CONCAT( #{bidPblancId}, '-', FORMAT( COALESCE( MAX(CONVERT(INT, RIGHT(BID_PBLANC_ID, LEN(BID_PBLANC_ID) - CHARINDEX('-', BID_PBLANC_ID)))) + 1, 0 ), '00' ) ) FROM BD_BID_BAS
INSERT INTO BD_BID_BAS values ( #{bidPblancId}, #{metalCode}, #{brandGroupCode}, #{brandCode}, #{itm}, #{dstrctLclsfCode}, #{bidWt}, #{permWtRate}, #{delyCnd01ApplcAt},
#{delyCnd01StdrPc}, #{delyCnd01premiumPc},
NULL, NULL,
#{delyCnd02ApplcAt},
#{delyCnd02StdrPc}, #{delyCnd02premiumPc},
NULL, NULL,
#{delyCnd03ApplcAt},
#{delyCnd03StdrPc}, #{delyCnd03premiumPc},
NULL, NULL,
#{delyBeginDe}, #{delyEndDe}, #{delyPdCn}, #{pcAppnBeginDe}, #{pcAppnEndDe}, #{pcAppnMthCode}, #{setleCrncyCode}, #{setleMthCode}, #{setlePdCode}, #{etcCn}, #{bddprBeginDt}, #{bddprEndDt}, #{bddprCanclPossAt},
NULL,
#{bddprCanclLmttDe},
#{bidSttusCode}, 0, 0, #{dspyAt}, 'N', NULL, 'N', NULL, #{frstRegisterId}, #{frstRegistDt}, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL )
